Description: Limestone stela; row of incised Hieroglyphic text at the top(damaged); twenty-eight lines of black painted Demotic text below.
Curator's comments: Young, T. 1828. Hieroglyphics, continued by the Royal Society of Literature; arranged by Thomas Young M.D.F.R.S. Vol. II, pl. 75. London. (facsimile of a much better preserved text) J. Quaegebeur, Chronique d'Egypte 49 (1974), 67 (no. 15).
